txt.en: Bedeviled roots can be found throughout Tríubad.\n\nYou have encountered some of the bedeviled roots the Woodmen described in their tales, and you should prune them before they overtake Tríubad.
You pruned many of the bedeviled roots at Tríubad.

You pruned many of the bedeviled roots at Tríubad. It is uncertain if the continued presence of the Taurogrim in Woodsedge will rouse more of them, but you have prevented them from overtaking Tríubad.
After the Taurogrim appeared at Tríubad, bedeviled roots burst from the ground and attacked the Woodmen.

After hearing tales of bedeviled roots from the Woodmen, you have encountered a vast number of them at Tríubad. You suspect they have been roused by the Taurogrim encroaching on Tríubad.\n\nYou should prune the roots before they overtake Tríubad.
